prompts.image_1: Create a realistic, professional hero image for '{project_name}' by {company_name}. Project context: {project_description}. Analyze the project type and industry to determine the most appropriate visual representation - for sports/fitness: athletes in action; for technology: modern workspace or digital interface; for healthcare: medical professionals or facilities; for education: learning environment; for business: professional setting. Use natural lighting, dynamic composition, and industry-appropriate elements. NO text, NO logos, NO generic stock photos. Fill the entire area with no borders or white space. The image must authentically represent the project's core purpose and industry.
prompts.image_2: Create a realistic, contextual supporting image for '{project_name}' by {company_name}. Project context: {project_description}. This image should complement image_1 by showing a different perspective of the same industry/context - if image_1 shows people, show the environment or tools; if image_1 shows action, show the setting or infrastructure. Match the visual style and industry of image_1. Use natural lighting and professional composition. NO text, NO company logos or branding, NO borders, NO stretching. The image must relate directly to the project's industry and purpose.
prompts.image_3: Create a realistic, impact-focused image for '{project_name}' by {company_name}. Project context: {project_description}. Show the tangible outcome, success, or transformation that this project delivers - for business projects: growth/results visualization; for service projects: satisfied users/clients; for product projects: real-world usage; for infrastructure projects: completed facilities or systems. Use natural lighting, professional composition, and industry-appropriate visuals. NO text, NO company logos or branding, NO borders, NO padding. Focus on authentic representation of project impact.
prompts.backgroundImage: Generate a professional, themed background image for '{project_name}' by {company_name}. Project context: {project_description}. Create an abstract or environmental background that reflects the project's industry and mood - use colors, textures, and patterns relevant to the industry (tech: modern/digital, nature: organic, corporate: clean/professional, creative: artistic). The background should be subtle enough for text overlay while maintaining visual interest. NO text, NO company logos or branding, NO busy patterns. Fill entire frame with professional, industry-appropriate aesthetic.
prompts.logo: Professional company logo for {company_name}. Clean, modern, minimal design that represents the company's industry and brand identity. Use simple shapes, professional typography, and industry-appropriate symbolism.
prompts.companyLogo: Professional company logo for {company_name}. Clean, modern, minimal design that represents the company's industry and brand identity. Use simple shapes, professional typography, and industry-appropriate symbolism.
prompts.chart_1: Generate a professional data visualization chart for '{project_name}' by {company_name}. Project context: {project_description}. Intelligently analyze the project description to determine the most relevant chart type and metrics: For performance tracking → line/area charts showing growth trends; For comparisons → bar/column charts showing comparative analysis; For distribution → pie/donut charts showing breakdown; For progress → gauge/progress indicators; For timelines → Gantt/timeline charts; For relationships → scatter/bubble charts. The chart must use realistic, contextually appropriate data that makes sense for the industry and project goals. Use modern, clean design with professional color scheme. EXACT dimensions: {placeholder_width}x{placeholder_height} {placeholder_unit}. Fill ENTIRE area, NO padding, NO borders, NO white space, NO company logos or branding. Labels must be clear and readable.
prompts.d_i_image_1: Create a professional, industry-specific image for '{project_name}' by {company_name}. Project context: {project_description}. Analyze the project type to generate appropriate visual: For design/creative projects: show design tools, mockups, or creative workspace; For technical projects: show code, architecture, or technical diagrams; For business projects: show analytics, meetings, or business tools; For product projects: show product development or prototyping. Use realistic, professional imagery that authentically represents the work involved. EXACT dimensions: {placeholder_width}x{placeholder_height} {placeholder_unit}.
